sections.general:
HOMEBOUND TEACHER
Career Focus
Utilize skills and talents in order to plan, direct, and manage the procurement of food products, equipment, and services that meet the requirements
and standards of the Child Nutrition Program by planning appropriate menus, following the dietary guidelines, and maintaining a safe and sanitary
environment.
Highlights
Extensive hospitality background Highly responsible and reliable
Food ingredients expert Works well under pressure
Food safety understanding Exceptional interpersonal skills
Accomplishments
Team Building and Leadership
Created collaborative classroom experiences
Served as student mentor and counselor for students when academic problems and personal adjustments byÂ meeting with guardians to
reach solutions.
Motivated students to engage with course materials by organizing engaging class activities and relating subject matters toÂ personal
experiences.
